permafrost.tundra.tn.route

Class RoutingRuleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.route.RoutingRuleHelper

  • public class RoutingRuleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of convenience methods for working with routing rules.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public static com.wm.app.tn.route.RoutingRule select(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc,
                                                     com.wm.data.IData parameters)
        Returns the processing rule to be used to process the given bizdoc.
        Parameters:
        bizdoc - The bizdoc to be processed.
        parameters - The TN_parms routing hints to use.
        Returns:
        The selected processing rule.

      • route

        public static com.wm.data.IData route(com.wm.app.tn.route.RoutingRule rule,
                                      com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc,
                                      com.wm.data.IData parameters)
                               throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Processes the given bizdoc using the given rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - The rule to use to process the bizdoc.
        bizdoc - The bizdoc to be processed.
        parameters - The optional TN_parms routing hints to use.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned from routing the bizdoc.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs invoking wm.tn.route:route.

      • isRoutable

        public static boolean isRoutable(com.wm.data.IData parameters)
        Whether the given parameters allow routing or not. Routing is disallowed when the given parameters contain a key named $bypassRouting with a value of true.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The optional TN_parms routing hints to use.
        Returns:
        True if routing is allowed, false if not.
